rooms.title: Standard room with Sea View
rooms.description: One queen bed Comfy beds.This tastefully decorated studio enjoys views over the Aegean Sea from its stone-paved patio. Featuring a kitchenette with fridge, the unit has air conditioning and LCD TV. Free Wi-Fi is provided.Please note that breakfast can be provided upon charge.

rooms.title: Deluxe One-Bedroom Suite with Garden and Sea View
rooms.description: This apartment offers views over the Aegean Sea and the town of Mykonos from its stone-paved patio. Featuring a kitchenette with fridge, the unit has air conditioning and LCD TV. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

rooms.title: Superior One-Bedroom Suite with Garden and Sea View
rooms.description: Featuring a patio that overlooks the Aegean Sea, this air conditioned apartment has a well equipped kitchen with fridge and LCD TV.

rooms.title: Deluxe Two-Bedroom Suite with Sea View
rooms.description: Divided over 2 levels, this spacious apartment features BBQ facilities, LCD TV, a well equipped kitchen and a seating area. The apartment has a patio offering views of the Aegean Sea.

rooms.title: Private Two-Bedroom Villa with Sea View
rooms.description: With views of the Aegean Sea and the town of Mykonos, this holiday home has a private entrance with a patio, a well equipped kitchenette, LCD TV and a seating area. Guests can also enjoy the BBQ facilities.

rooms.title: Agnandicielo Two-Bedroom Villa with Panoramic Sea View
rooms.description: Divided over 2 levels, this spacious apartment has a kitchen, LCD TV and a seating area. It features a patio with panoramic views of the Aegean Sea and includes BBQ facilities, fridge and kitchenware.
